snippet.title: Cruis’n Blast - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch | E3 2021
snippet.description:
Race, drift and blast your way through over-the-top tracks with up to 4 friends when the supercharged arcade smash hit Cruis’n Blast speeds onto Nintendo Switch this fall! 

Learn more here: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/cruisn-blast-switch/

#CruisnBlast #NintendoDirect #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
